parameters.jsonBody: ={{ ({ guild_id: $env.DISCORD_GUILD_ID, channel_id: $json.channel_id || $env.DISCORD_QUESTIONS_CHANNEL_ID, thread_id: $json.thread_id || '', message_id: $json.id, author_id: $json.author_id, author_name: $json.author_name, content: $json.content, timestamp: $json.timestamp }) }}
